message.entry: MaximumNumPoints cannot have a fractional value. The value has been rounded up to {0, number, integer}.
Length of argument X ({0,number,integer}) must be equal to length of argument Y ({1,number,integer}).
Length of argument X ({0,number,integer}) must be equal to length of argument Y ({1,number,integer}) and must be equal to length of argument Z ({2,number,integer}).
Invalid type for argument {0}. Type must be a numeric type, datetime, duration or categorical.
Data inputs must match the axis configuration. Values added to a numeric axis must be a vector of numeric type.
At least one axis dimension is configured for {0} values. Values added to that axis must be a numeric or {1} array.

Number of points exceeds the default maximum number of points of {0,number,integer}. To control the number of points in the animated line, set the MaximumNumPoints property of the AnimatedLine object to the desired value.
Invalid number of convenience arguments : {0, number, integer}. Valid inputs are animatedline(X,Y,...) or animatedline(X,Y,Z,...).
Specify either two or three output arguments.
